popText.text: Several members of the group get very drunk – and one person falls down some stairs and breaks his arm. A new person has to be hired to cover, and he is a much slower worker, so the project gets delayed.

After overhearing a few conversations, the customer realizes that the project delay is due to an event where Carlos treated some of the workers to drinks at a sports bar. She calls Carlos’ manager to complain.
One of the subcontractors posts a picture of the accident on Facebook. He writes in his post saying “last time I’m drinking with the Johnson Controls crew...”
Carlos wonders if the injured subcontractor can sue the company.
